# Vector

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source("_common.R")
```

## Atomic Vectors

-   logical
-   numeric: integer, double
-   character

### Scalar

```{r vec-atom}
lgl_var <- c(TRUE, FALSE)
int_var <- c(1L, 6L, 10L)
dbl_var <- c(1, 2.5, 4.5)
chr_var <- c("these are", "some strings")
```

```{r vec-atom-type}
typeof(lgl_var)
typeof(int_var)
typeof(dbl_var)
typeof(chr_var)
```

### Longer Vector

```{r}
c(c(1, 2), c(3, 4))
```

### Missing Value

`NA` will propagate except

```{r}
NA ^ 0

NA | TRUE

NA & FALSE
```
